Ah see now, you can’t even keep your stories straight. First you say it tested positive for cannabis, now you say it’s cocaine.

[quote]Ok and finally my mum was thinking get the police involved, because she is pretty stumpted as to why their is cocaine in the school food, but if she does that the police will probably think “oh kids are always taking drugs its probbaly just the mum being surprised about it”
[/quote]
[/quote]
lol i new this was gonna come up… its canabis for definate… i got mixed up… and wtf ok fine im deleting this thread now.[/quote] you cant delete your own thread. And we certainly wont let it die.

item.title: I got suspended from school.closed
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:26, topic:23832”][quote author=blacker link=topic=36215.msg439447#msg439447 date=1163274813]
Ily, you seriously think someone would be stupid enough to slip something into his food when a teacher’s looking? I doubt it.
[/quote]
GODDAMMIT MY NAME IS Ilya, see the little A at the end???

That’s what I meant, wouldn’t the teachers see if someone put something in his food/drink?[/quote] No, no, What I’m saying is that IF someone slipped something in his food, he probably wouldn’t be stupid enough to slip it in while a teacher was looking, so he probably did it when the teacher wasn’t looking (duh) Leaving this statement:[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:24, topic:23832”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=36215.msg439342#msg439342 date=1163273313]

HOLY SHIT!!!This might even be better than my p hat report, although a lot shorter…
Don’t you have any friends or imagination?!?!? Call up a friend and ask them if they can bring you over a school tuna sandwich and some crackers, tell them that you’ll pay twice the whatever the price is and what it’s for. Them call the cops and give them the story and the food for analisus(sorry about spelling)(they can’t say no, it’s their job).
“tis is teh faikest fread ever get a lyfe nub” I had to say that…

i really dont know what to do, it may have just been something they slipped into my sandwich when i wasnt looking… ergh i just dont know… going out now be back later x
[/quote]
If there are teachers supervising you, wouldn’t they see if someone slipped something?[/quote] null and void. So of course there were teachers supervising him, but who says they had to see the person slip the drug in?

Read full topic
